title: User Registration Success
description: Verify successful user registration with valid email, username, and password

steps.description: Navigate to registration page or API endpoint
Submit valid full name, email, username, and password
Registration is successful and user is created in database
Password is stored hashed using bcrypt

title: User Registration with Duplicate Email or Username
description: Verify registration fails if email or username already exists

steps.description: Attempt to register with an email or username that already exists
Registration request is rejected with appropriate error message

title: User Login Success
description: Check login is successful with correct username and password

steps.description: Navigate to login page or API endpoint
Input correct username and password
Submit login request
User is authenticated and receives valid session or token

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails when incorrect username or password is provided

steps.description: Attempt login with wrong username or password
Login request is denied with error message

title: Password Reset Success
description: Verify password reset workflow succeeds with matching new passwords

steps.description: Request password reset with valid username
Provide new_password and confirm_password matching
Submit password reset request
Password is updated and hashed correctly in database

title: Password Reset Failure with Mismatched New Passwords
description: Ensure password reset fails when new_password and confirm_password do not match

steps.description: Request password reset with valid username
Provide mismatched new_password and confirm_password
Submit password reset request
Password reset request is rejected with validation error

title: Video/Audio File Upload Success
description: Validate that valid audio/video files can be uploaded successfully

steps.description: Choose a supported audio or video file format (e.g. mp4, mp3)
Upload the file via API or frontend
Upload succeeds and file is stored in GridFS
File metadata is saved in user's processing history

title: Video/Audio File Upload Failure with Unsupported Format
description: Ensure that uploading unsupported file formats is rejected

steps.description: Attempt to upload unsupported file format (e.g. .exe or text file)
Upload is rejected with clear error message

title: Speech-to-Text Transcription Accuracy for Model Sizes
description: Verify transcription accuracy and performance with tiny, medium, and large Whisper models

steps.description: Upload audio/video file and select 'tiny' model
Request transcription processing
Transcribed text matches expected output within acceptable error margin
Repeat above steps with 'medium' and 'large' models
Verify transcription quality improves and processing time increases with model size

title: Translation Service Correctness
description: Check that translated text segments correctly reflect target language

steps.description: Provide transcription segments in source language
Request translation to a variety of target languages (English, Spanish, Chinese)
Translated segments are accurate and coherent in target languages

title: Translation Service Handles Unsupported Language
description: Ensure system gracefully handles translation requests to unsupported target languages

steps.description: Request translation with invalid or unsupported target language code
Translation request fails with proper error message

title: Subtitle Rendering Formatting and Synchronization
description: Validate subtitles are correctly rendered on video with appropriate font, positioning, and timing

steps.description: Provide video path and segments with start/end times and text
Submit request to render subtitles with font path
Output video contains subtitles with correct timing and placement
Subtitles for multiple scripts are rendered with appropriate fonts

title: Subtitle File Download
description: Verify users can download generated SRT subtitle files

steps.description: Generate subtitle SRT file from processed video/audio
Request download using filename parameter
Subtitle file is downloaded and content matches expected subtitles

title: Video with Embedded Subtitles Download
description: Verify users can download videos with embedded subtitles

steps.description: Process video to embed subtitles
Request download of video file using filename parameter
Video file is downloaded and subtitles are visible when played

title: User Processing History Limit
description: Ensure user processing history stores only last 3 processed files

steps.description: Process more than 3 video/audio files sequentially
Only the last 3 files are preserved in user's processing history

title: Admin User Login and Authorization
description: Validate admin users can login and access admin panel features

steps.description: Admin user navigates to admin login page
Admin user inputs valid credentials and submits login
Admin user is authenticated and granted access to admin panel

title: Admin Manage User Roles
description: Verify admin can update user roles with valid changes

steps.description: Admin searches for a user in admin panel
Admin updates the user role via admin API
User role is updated successfully and reflected in system

title: Admin Block and Unblock Users
description: Check admin can block and unblock users and that blocked users are restricted

steps.description: Admin blocks a user account
Blocked user is prevented from logging in or submitting jobs
Admin unblocks the same user
User is able to login and use services after unblocking

title: Admin Delete Users
description: Validate that admin can delete user accounts and associated data

steps.description: Admin deletes a user account via admin API
User cannot login and all related data is removed from system and GridFS

title: File Storage and Retrieval via GridFS
description: Test storing and retrieving files in GridFS for audio/video and subtitles

steps.description: Upload file to GridFS storage
File is stored and metadata is recorded
Retrieve stored file by filename or id
Retrieved file data matches uploaded content

title: UI Responsiveness and Real-time Progress Tracking
description: Check that the UI updates real-time to show processing progress during transcription and rendering

steps.description: Upload file and start subtitle generation via UI
UI shows progress bar or percentage updates in real-time
UI remains responsive without freezing during processing

title: Multiple Script Subtitle Rendering and Font Selection
description: Ensure subtitles with different scripts (e.g. Latin, Cyrillic, Chinese) are rendered with appropriate fonts

steps.description: Submit subtitle rendering request with segments containing multiple scripts
Rendered video contains correctly displayed subtitles using auto-selected fonts matching scripts

title: System Performance Benchmark by Model Size and File Size
description: Validate system processes files within performance targets depending on Whisper model size and input file size

steps.description: Process files of varying sizes using 'tiny', 'medium', and 'large' models
Processing times conform to expected benchmarks for each model size

title: Input Validation for API Endpoints
description: Verify all API endpoints properly validate input parameters and reject invalid or malicious inputs

steps.description: Send malformed or invalid data to signup, login, upload, process, translate, render, admin, and DB endpoints
Endpoints respond with appropriate error status and messages without crashing

title: Access Control Restrictions
description: Validate that user-specific and admin-only APIs enforce proper authorization and access control

steps.description: Attempt to access admin endpoints with regular user credentials
Access is denied with authorization error
Attempt to access user-specific resources (e.g. processing history) without authentication
Request is rejected with authentication error
